name: 'Pale Rider' - Art print (A3 approx)
description:
Size: Oversized A3 (31.9 x 44.9cm)
Type: Digital print
Edition: Open edition

UNFRAMED

Signed by the artist.

'Pale Rider' pays homage to the flagship beer of The Kelham Island Brewery. It is the latest print by artist Jim Connolly. 

Jim has re-imagined the Kelham Island district as a scene from a classic wild west movie. The Fat Cat, Brewery and Chimney House are visited by a high-plains drinker who has come to settle old scores whilst enjoying a pint of the 2004 Champion Beer of Britain. It follows a popular series of beer labels Jim has created for the brewery and is also available via the brewery shop.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery

name: Cult Products Double-Bill Offer - 2 Art prints (A3 approx)
description:
'Pale Rider' & 'Use the Sauce' - Open Edition Art prints (A3 approx)

Size: Oversized A3 (31.9 x 44.9cm)
Type: Digital prints
Edition: Open edition

UNFRAMED

Signed by the artist.

This offer includes a copy of the two Steel City cult product prints by Jim Connolly. 'Use The Sauce' pays homage to classic product Henderson's Relish and 'Pale Rider' celebrates the flagship beer of the Kelham Island Brewery.

Turn your kitchen wall into a shrine to fine dining & drinking!

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery

name: 'Use the Sauce' - Art print (A3 approx)
description:
Size: Oversized A3 (31.9 x 44.9cm)
Type: Digital print
Edition: Open edition

UNFRAMED

Signed by the artist.

In honour of Sheffield's beloved Henderson's Relish print 2 in this series combines super-powers with everyone's favourite condement. The image is drawn in comic strip panels, culminating in a mouth watering finale and a (terrible) sci-fi related gag.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery.

name: 'Mind Control' - A4 Print
description:
Size: A4
Type: Digital print 
Edition: Open edition

Signed by the artist

UNFRAMED

Part 6 of a 6-part series

'Mind Control' is an art print featuring the sixth pump design in my 'Light Vs Dark' series made in collaberation with the Kelham Island Brewery. 

She has amazing powers of the mind derived from her double IPA, making her the toughest of all her comrades. Her inspiration came mainly from the Xmen and partly Batman's X-girlfriend Silver Sable. Possibly a hint of Tank Girl too.

She will be in pubs from July 2013 as the Kelham Island Brewery's monthly special. Drink responsibly as she is ABV 6.9%.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery.

name: 'Crimson Steel' - A4 Print
description:
Size: A4
Type: Digital print 
Edition: Open edition

Signed by the artist

UNFRAMED

Part 5 of a 6-part series

'Crimson Steel' is an art print featuring the fifth pump design in my 'Light Vs Dark' series made in collaberation with the Kelham Island Brewery. 

He is the wise and tough leader of the good guys, dishing out the blows with his stainless steel weaponry. 

Equal parts Aragorn and Batman this fella is not to be messed with. 

He will be in pubs from June 2013 as the Kelham Island Brewery's monthly special.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery

name: 'Mistress Flames' - A4 Print
description:
Size: A4
Type: Digital print 
Edition: Open edition

Signed by the artist

UNFRAMED

Part 4 of a 6-part series

'Mistress Flames' is an art print featuring the forth pump design in my 'Light Vs Dark' series made in collaberation with the Kelham Island Brewery. 

This fiery vamp is a tough and sexy member of the bad guys. Her burning blood is juxtaposed by her cold vampiric nature.

She was inspired by Mike Mignola's take on Batgirl and various other darker aspects of DC Comics.

She will be in pubs from May 2013 as the Kelham Island Brewery's monthly special.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery

name: 'Gentleman Death' - A4 Print
description:
Size: A4
Type: Digital print 
Edition: Open edition

Signed by the artist

UNFRAMED

Part 3 of a 6-part series

'Gentleman Death' is an art print featuring the third pump design in my 'Light Vs Dark' series made in collaberation with the Kelham Island Brewery. 

This dapper chap is the leader of the bad guys. Equal parts Skeletor and Basil Fawlty he uses black magic to acheive his dastardly ends.

He was inspired by the darker side of DC Comics with a hint of Tim Burton thrown in.

He will be in pubs from April 2013 as the Kelham Island Brewery's monthly special.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery

name: 'Dunkel Devastator' - A4 Print
description:
Size: A4
Type: Digital print 
Edition: Open edition

Signed by the artist

UNFRAMED

Part 2 of a 6-part series

'Dunkel Devastator' is an art print featuring the second pump design in my 'Light Vs Dark' series made in collaberation with the Kelham Island Brewery. 

This huge beast leaps across the universe looking for planets to smash with his hammer of doom. We'd all be in trouble if he found earth. Luckily he is incredibly thick.

He is the muscle of the bad guys and a formidable foe inspired by the intergalactic shennanigans of Marvel comics.

He will be in pubs from March 2013 as the Kelham Island Brewery's monthly special.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery

name: 'Tin Can Avenger' - A4 Print
description:
Size: A4
Type: Digital print 
Edition: Open edition

Signed by the artist

UNFRAMED

Part 1 of a 6-part series

'Tin Can Avenger' is an art print featuring the first pump design in my 'Light Vs Dark' series made in collaberation with the Kelham Island Brewery. 

This big fella was inspired by the early Iron Man designs with a few other nods to Marvel characters thrown in. He also owes a bit to Metal Mickey, Ram Man and even Dusty Bin. 

He is the muscle of the good guys and dedicated to ending the consumption of cheap dirty beer with his metalhead armour and his kick-ass unicycle. 

He will be in pubs from febuary 2013 as the Kelham Island Brewery's monthly special.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery

name: 'Rocket & Radar Men combo'  - A4 Print
description:
Size: A4
Type: Digital print 
Edition: Open edition

Signed by the artist

UNFRAMED

Made in collaberation with the Kelham Island Brewery these two designs celebrate the 40s serials 'King of the Rocketmen' and 'Radar Men From the Moon'.

They will be in pubs in August & October 2013 respectively as the Kelham Island Brewery's monthly special.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery.

name: 'Light Vs Dark Promo Poster' - Art print (A3 approx)
description:
Size: Oversized A3 (31.9 x 44.9cm)
Type: Digital print
Edition: Open edition

Signed by the artist

UNFRAMED

Presenting a reprint of the promotional poster for my recent 'Light Vs Dark' series in collaberation with The Kelham Island Brewery. This print collects all 6 characters from opposing sides of the battle, each representing both pale and dark ales.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery.

name: 'Fright Night 2012' - A3 print (A3 standard size)
description:
Size: Standard A3 (will fit a regular A3 frame)
Type: Digital print
Edition: Limited Edition of 250

UNFRAMED

Signed and numbered by the artist.

I worked with Yellow Bus Events to create the poster for this years horrifically popular Fright Night halloween carnival in Sheffield city centre. To celebrate this we've teamed up to launch a special limited edition artist's rework of the poster design.

The theme of the event was Voodoo and I can promise I had alot of fun turning the Winter Gardens into a grissly scene, which I watched become a gory reality on the night.

Please note that this print is in a standard A3 format which is slightly smaller than my Steel City series. The upside of this is that they will fit nicely into a regular A3 frame.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery

name: 'They Ate The Eggbox' - Art print (A3 approx)
description:
Size: Oversized A3 (31.9 x 44.9cm)
Type: Digital print
Edition: Open edition

UNFRAMED

Signed by the artist.

In 2002 the Eggbox was demolished in an amazing spectacle of dinosaur-esque eating machines. Opinion is strongly divided as to whether this was a good or bad thing, but no one can deny that the Eggbox's demise was a sight to behold. My 8th Sheffield print features a re-imagining of the destruction as-if actual dinosaurs were given the contract. The result is a monster movie poster paying homage to this now extinct sheff icon.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery

name: 'The Man Of Steel City' - Art print (A3 approx)
description:
Size: Oversized A3 (31.9 x 44.9cm)
Type: Digital print
Edition: Open edition

UNFRAMED

Signed by the artist.

Since I began the Sheffield series I've been itching to somehow combine the Steel City with the world's greatest superhero. In this spoof comic cover we can see this heroic bloke racing down the dogs, sparring with a super-tram, leaping the arts tower and fighting for Sheff's rich cultural history! My 7th Sheff themed print but not the last!

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery

name: 'Terror at Tinsley Towers!' - Art print (A3 approx)
description:
Size: Oversized A3 (31.9 x 44.9cm)
Type: Digital print
Edition: Open edition

UNFRAMED

Signed by the artist.

To commemorate the destruction of South Yorkshire's iconic Tinsley Towers I worked with Archipelago to satorise the event. The towers are seen being blown to smithereens by UFOs in the style of an old B-movie poster but with a Sheffield twist.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery

name: 'Bargains of the Damned' - Art print (A3 approx)
description:
Size: Oversized A3 (31.9 x 44.9cm)
Type: Digital print
Edition: Open edition

UNFRAMED

Signed by the artist.

Print 3 is a fictional horror film poster about a certain local shopping mall. Most people from the general area will have lived this nightmare either on a gruesome weekend or (like me and most other blokes) during a mad panic to buy pressies on christmas eve. 
The main inspiration for this piece was Romero's 1978 classic 'Dawn of the Dead'. 

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery.

name: 'Steel Finger' - Art print (A3 approx)
description:
Size: Oversized A3 (31.9 x 44.9cm)
Type: Digital print
Edition: Open edition

UNFRAMED

Signed by the artist.

Steel Finger is a parody of a classic poster theme. It shows a Bond-like figure engaged in several action poses and adventures with a backdrop of many of the Steel City's finest landmarks.
Remember to duck if you see the flat cap!

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery.

name: 'Attack on Steel City' - Limited Art print (A3 approx)
description:
Size: Oversized A3 (31.1 x 45cm)
!!!Please note new size and paper thickness!!!

Type: Quality Digital printed on 300gsm

Limited Edition of 100 copies only.
All signed and numbered by the artist.

UNFRAMED.

'Attack on Steel City' revisits the alien attack at the series offset. The main focus is a Godzilla-style square-off between two mighty titans in a satirical look at Sheffield's football rivalry. Also, an exhibition of Triffids goes horribly wrong and the Surrey St. Policebox pays homage to everyone's favourite time traveller ;)

!!!THIS PRODUCT HAS NOW SOLD OUT!!!
Westend Picture Framing (Sharrowvale Rd), the Old Sweetshop and APG may have remaining copies in store.

name: 'Escape From The Moor' - Limited Art print (A3 approx)
description:
Size: Oversized A3 (32 x 45cm)

Type: Quality Digital printed on 280gsm

Limited Edition of 100 copies only.
All signed and numbered by the artist.

UNFRAMED.

'Escape From the Moor' shows an alternative take on Sheffield's famous shopping area 'The Moor', in which gangs of crazed OAPs rule the streets, post-apocalyptic poundshops loom menacingly and other familiar characters lurk.

!!!THIS PRODUCT HAS NOW SOLD OUT!!!
Westend Picture Framing (Sharrowvale Rd), the Old Sweetshop and APG may have remaining copies in store.

name: 'MORONOID' Issue 1 comic-book
description:
Issue: 1
Size: A5
Pages: 24
Format: Black and white interior & colour cover


'Moronoid' Issue 1 is an anthology-style comic-book featuring several short self contained stories by creators Jim Connolly, Anjan Sarkar, Philip Barrett and Marcus Daley.
Issue 1 features a reversable cover by it's publishers Anjan Sarkar and Jim Connolly.

Please allow a minimum of 2 weeks for delivery
